full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNUB SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I SDE BRGYAD CHA SNYOM PAR BYED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (GNOD SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I SDE BRGYAD CHA SNYOM PAR BYED PA 'DI NI, SER BA BSRUNG BA, PRI'U GSO BA, ,MDOS GLUD RDZONGS PA, GTOR ZOR 'PHEN PA, ,MKHAR LAS, SA RKO, ,RDO GLOG ,KLU SHING GCOD PA, LAS GANG BYED PA SNGON DU 'GRO BA'I SDE BRGYAD KYI MCHOD PA BCOS THABS @003A *, ,'DI LTA BU ZHIG MED NA, BYIS PA'I MKHAR LAS DANG 'DRA ZHES GSUNGS PAS GNUB SANGS RGYAS YE SHES RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I RDZOGS CHEN KUN BZANG GZHAN PHAN RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I SDE BRGYAD MCHOD GTOR GSER SKYEMS 'PHRIN BCOL DANG BCAS PA CHOG 'GRIG TU BKOD PA'O,, ,,)
